### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0), and offshore pump(position x=107.5, y=-33.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)
Consists of furnace(position x=62.0, y=-54.0)

### Water supply system at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=107.5, y=-33.5) and pipe group(position x=107.5, y=-34.5)

### Steam supply system at position(x=117.5, y=-34.5)
Consists of boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0), steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), and pipe group(position x=117.5, y=-34.5)

### Belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of two belts(position x=63.5, y=-53.5 and position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities.
- Check the entity's fuel or inventory requirements before inserting items.

### Errors when using entities without proper connections
- Ensure that entities are properly connected to each other before using them.
- Check the entity's connection points and neighbours before using them.

### Errors when harvesting resources
- Ensure that you have the required tools or equipment to harvest resources.
- Check the resource's position and availability before attempting to harvest.

### NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned by the agent.
